macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: U.S. Stock Indices Close Mixed with Tech Leading Gains
items.summary: The S&P 500 climbed 0.88% to 6,834.50, the Nasdaq Composite spiked 1.31% to 23,307.62, and the Russell 2000 advanced 0.86% to 2,529.42, while the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.38% to 48,134.89. Technology stocks recovered late week behind gains in Oracle and AI data center plays.

items.title: Asian Markets Show Strength with Nikkei, Shanghai, and Hang Seng Gains
items.summary: The Nikkei Index jumped 895 points to 50,402, the Shanghai Index added 26 points to 3,917, and the Hang Seng Index advanced 111 points to 25,801, while European indices showed slight declines.

items.title: Inflation Moderates with CPI Falling to 2.7% Headline and 2.6% Core
items.summary: Headline and core CPI declined to 2.7% and 2.6% year-over-year respectively, while nonfarm payrolls grew by 64k in November and the unemployment rate ticked up to 4.6%.

items.title: Micron Shares Surge on Strong AI Chip Demand Outlook
items.summary: Micron (MU) shares surged late week after reporting upbeat results and forecasts on booming AI chip demand, helping the broader technology sector rebound.

items.title: Gold and Silver Miners Rally as Precious Metals Hit Record Highs
items.summary: Newmont (NEM) gained 2.6% and Coeur Mining (CDE) rose 3.6% as gold and silver prices climbed to record highs, with gold prices driven higher by geopolitical concerns and rising deficits.

items.title: Christmas Gift Prices Rise 4.5% in 2025, Gold Rings Surge 32.5%
items.summary: According to PNC's Christmas Price Index, overall gift prices increased 4.5% year-over-year in 2025, with gold rings experiencing a dramatic 32.5% surge due to geopolitical risks and rising deficits.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Major Cryptocurrencies Trading Mixed with POLYX, ANIME, and EPIC Leading Gains
items.summary: Most major cryptocurrencies by market cap are trading mixed on December 22, 2025, with market outperformers including POLYX (up 22%), ANIME (up 18%), and EPIC (up 17%). Ethereum trades at $3,036.89 (+1.45%), BNB at $866.15 (+1.52%), and Bitcoin-wrapped tokens at $89,371.65 (+1.07%).

items.title: Gold Surges to New Record, Outperforming Bitcoin
items.summary: Gold has surged to new record highs while cryptocurrency prices remain muted, with Bitcoin slipping from day's highs during U.S. trading sessions. Gold is currently outperforming Bitcoin as a store of value.

items.title: DOJ Official Todd Blanche Shut Down Crypto Enforcement While Holding Crypto Assets
items.summary: ProPublica reports that Todd Blanche, the second-highest official at the Justice Department, held cryptocurrency assets worth $159,000 to $485,000 and shut down crypto enforcement actions while failing to fully divest his holdings as required by his ethics agreement. The report raises concerns about conflicts of interest in crypto regulation.

items.title: Brazil's Crypto Activity Jumps 43% in 2025
items.summary: Brazil has experienced a significant surge in cryptocurrency activity, with a 43% increase in 2025 and average investments topping $1,000 per participant.

items.title: U.S. Lawmakers Urge IRS to Revise Crypto Staking Tax Rules by 2026
items.summary: U.S. lawmakers are pushing the Internal Revenue Service to revise cryptocurrency staking tax rules before 2026, addressing concerns about the current regulatory framework.

items.title: U.S. Federal Bank Regulators Approve Legal Cryptocurrency Transactions and Custody
items.summary: U.S. Federal Bank Regulators have approved legal cryptocurrency transactions and custody services, marking a regulatory milestone for the digital assets industry.

items.title: Uniswap Hits Record Users
items.summary: Uniswap has reached record numbers of users, indicating growing adoption of decentralized exchange platforms.

items.title: Market Sentiment Shows Cautious Optimism in BTC and ETH Options
items.summary: Options market sentiment indicates cautious optimism regarding Bitcoin and Ethereum, suggesting measured investor confidence in major cryptocurrencies.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Medicus Pharma Engages Reliant AI for AI-Driven Clinical Data Analytics Platform
items.summary: Medicus Pharma Ltd. announced a partnership with Reliant AI to develop an artificial intelligence-driven clinical data analytics platform to support the development of Teverelix, a next-generation GnRH antagonist for acute urinary retention and high cardiovascular risk prostate cancer, representing approximately $6 billion in potential market opportunity.

items.title: The Hackett Group Launches XT and AIXelerator Gen AI-Assisted Platforms
items.summary: The Hackett Group announced the launch of XT and AIXelerator, two new generative AI-enabled service delivery platforms designed to accelerate transformation consulting and technology implementation engagements using the company's proprietary solution language model.

items.title: Zero Trust AI Security Framework Advances with Machine Learning Integration
items.summary: New developments in zero trust AI security demonstrate how machine learning algorithms are improving detection accuracy through continuous learning and processing vast datasets to identify subtle indicators of compromise in cybersecurity frameworks.

items.title: Jabil Combines Machine Learning and Generative AI for International Trade Code Accuracy
items.summary: Jabil implemented a layered AI approach combining machine learning with generative AI to improve accuracy in assigning international trade codes, using a chatbot to validate machine learning estimates and reduce errors in critical business processes.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Prime Video Adds 2nd-Highest-Grossing Video Game Movie Ever
items.summary: Prime Video has added one of the highest-grossing video game movies of all time to its streaming platform on December 22, 2025.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Bosch Announces AI Extension Platform for AI-Powered Cockpits at CES 2026
items.summary: Robert Bosch LLC will unveil a new AI-enabled high-performance computing unit for AI-powered cockpits, developed with Microsoft and NVIDIA, at CES 2026 in Las Vegas.

items.title: Hyundai Motor Group to Debut Humanoid Robot at CES 2026
items.summary: Hyundai Motor Group plans to present its robotics strategy, including a humanoid robot debut, at CES 2026.

items.title: AI Glasses Emerge as Major 2025 Hardware Trend with Explosive Growth Projected
items.summary: AI glasses are predicted to ship 5.5 million units in 2025, up 135% year-over-year, with giants like Huawei, Xiaomi, Baidu, Alibaba, and Li Auto competing in this new smart hardware category.
